verses.name: Acts 2:30
verses.text: Therefore being a prophet, and knowing that God had sworn with an oath to him, that of the fruit of his loins, according to the flesh, he would raise up Christ to sit on his throne;

verses.name: Acts 2:31
verses.text: He seeing this before spake of the resurrection of Christ, that his soul was not left in hell, neither his flesh did see corruption.

verses.name: Acts 2:32
verses.text: This Jesus hath God raised up, whereof we all are witnesses.
